downloadTitle: Microsoft Lync Online Conferencing and Collaboration Training
downloadDescription: Learn how to schedule, join, and manage online meetings with Microsoft Lync Online.

downloadFile.name: Microsoft Lync Online Conferencing and Collaboration Training.pptx
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/8/d/b/8db93413-7f5a-45e3-a191-2311851d5145/Microsoft Lync Online Conferencing and Collaboration Training.pptx

detailsSection:
This training course covers the following Microsoft Lync Online Conferencing and Collaboration features:
  • Schedule an Online Meeting
  • Customize your meeting options
  • Join your online meeting
  • Deliver a Professional Presentation
  • Collaborate with Anyone Anywhere
detailsSection_file_name: Microsoft Lync Online Conferencing and Collaboration Training.pptx
installInstructionSection: To install this download, save the file to a directory on your computer. After you save the file, open the presentation as you typically would. To remove this download, delete the file from the directory where you saved it.
